blackbox.BehaviorBox

class BehaviorBox(tk.Tk, Experiment)

Baseline code to initialize everything.

Parameters

  • tk.Tk – Tkinter window

  • Experiment – Experiment class

__init__(*args, **kwargs)

Initializes Tkinter frames, renders all pages, and raises StartPage.

Creates button styles and sets font sizes.

Parameters

  • *args – Variable length argument list

  • **kwargs – Arbitrary keyword arguments

startfresh()

Reinitialize page and update values. Works on the following pages: StartPage, ExpSelPg, TimeSelPg, ConfirmPg, InsertPg, StimPrepPg, DataDelPg.

show_frame(cont)

Raises frame cont to front.

show_frameAlpha(cont)

Resets all variables in the Experiment class and reinitalizes all necessary pages to starting state. Raises frame cont to front.

Used when navigating from StartPage to ExpSelPg.

show_frameZebra(cont)

Stops camera preview. Raises frame cont to front.

Used when navigating from InsertPg to ConfirmPg.

show_frameFish(cont)

Starts camera preview. Raises frame cont to front.

Used when navigating from ConfirmPg to InsertPg.

show_frameCharlie(cont)

Confirms labels. Raises frame cont to front.

Used when navigating from TimeSelPg to ConfirmPg.

show_frameDelta(cont)

Depending on the type of experiment selected, displays ready or prompts the user to insert stimuli. Raises frame cont to front.

Used when navigating from InsertPg to StimPrepPg.

show_frameEcho(cont)

Creates a folder for experiment data and images. Captures images for duration of experiment and saves images to /ExpDataPictures/image. Raises frame cont to front.

Sets frame rate for image capturing based on type of experiment selected.

  • Chemotaxis: fps=0.33

  • Scrunching: fps=4

show_frameFoxtrot(cont)

Reinitalizes frame cont without prompting for confirmation.

show_frameFoxtrot2(cont)

Prompts user for confirmation and reinitializes frame cont.

show_frameLima(cont, chosenexp)

Loads Momo object and displays first image from chosen experiment. Raises frame cont to front.

Used when navigating from DataAnalysisPg to DataAnalysisImagePg.

Momo

Global variable to store experiment object.

show_frameBean(cont)

Displays the first picture and raises frame cont to front.

Used when navigating from AnalysisTypeForNone to DataAnalysisImagePg.

show_frameMarlin(cont)

Configures ReviewData to display all images taken during the experiment on a Tkinter canvas. Raises frame cont to front.

Used when navigating from ExpFinishPg to ReviewData.

show_frameStingray(cont, obj)

Saves obj and raises frame cont to front.

Used when navigating from ReviewData to StartPage.

show_frameRhino(cont)

Recursively deletes all experiment data stored in Appa.savefile and raises frame cont to front.

Used when navigating from ReviewData to StartPage.

show_frameShark(cont)

Checks to see if an experiment was chosen to graph and checks if the selected experiment has already been analyzed. Raises frame cont to front.

Used when navigating from DataGraphChoice to GraphPage.

show_frameSquid(cont)

Starts camera preview and raises frame cont to front.

Used when navigating from StartPage to CameraPreviewPg.
